tooltip.manual_input: CTRL + Left Click to input manually
tooltip.uncheck_achievement: Uncheck to hide a specific achievement tracker

modal.message: You have completed all of the achievements this mod tracks!

hunters_bronze_shield.name: Hunter's Bronze Shield
hunters_bronze_shield.description: Awarded for hunting 100 large master rank monsters.

hunters_silver_shield.name: Hunter's Silver Shield
hunters_silver_shield.description: Awarded for hunting 500 large master rank monsters.

hunters_gold_shield.name: Hunter's Gold Shield
hunters_gold_shield.description: Awarded for hunting 1000 large master rank monsters.

baharis_hand_wound_birdie.name: Bahari's Hand-Wound Birdie
baharis_hand_wound_birdie.description: Awarded for spending 3000 Investigation Coins at the Anomaly Research Lab.

golden_spiribug_plate.name: Golden Spiribug Plate
golden_spiribug_plate.description: Awarded for gathering 1000 Golden and Gilded Spiribugs.

spiritwood_necklace.name: Spiritwood Necklace
spiritwood_necklace.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Shrine Ruins.

frozen_lampsquid_earring.name: Frozen Lampsquid Earring
frozen_lampsquid_earring.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Frost Islands.

silver_cactus_ring.name: Silver Cactus Ring
silver_cactus_ring.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Sandy Plains.

prismatic_chalice.name: Prismatic Chalice
prismatic_chalice.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Flooded Forest.

heliotrope_bracelet.name: Heliotrope Bracelet
heliotrope_bracelet.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Lava Caverns.

copal_brooch.name: Copal Brooch
copal_brooch.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Citadel.

sea_blue_amulet.name: Sea-Blue Amulet
sea_blue_amulet.description: Awarded for completing 50 quests in the Jungle.

well_done_grillmeister.name: Well-done Grillmeister
well_done_grillmeister.description: Awarded for cooking a welldone steak 30 times.
